805260.name: PICNIC
805260.description:
PICNIC is a 3 dimensional labyrinth game - a surreal digital labyrinth - an anti-game - a nightmare (including horrible noises, falling off the map, nightmarish slow walking speed...) - an essay about the surrealist Raymond Roussel - an avant-garde composition - a text labyrinth - a noise labyrinth (depending on the game play).

Let's have a picnic on the green hill!
805260.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
